backgroundupdate-enable-unelevated-insta.userFacingDescription: Update Firefox when it is not running if the application directory can be written (even without the Mozilla Maintenance Service).

extensions-migration-in-import-wizard-11.userFacingDescription: This rollout makes extension migration available to users migrating from Chrome to Firefox.

upgrade-spotlight-rollout.userFacingDescription: Experimenting on onboarding content when you upgrade Firefox.

encrypted-client-hello-fallback-mechanis.userFacingDescription: This experiment enables a fallback mechanism for Encrypted Client Hello. This feature maximizes compatibility with websites that have misconfigured or unexpected DNS configurations.

fx-accounts-ping-release-rollout-2.userFacingDescription: Enable sending the Fx Accounts ping.

disable-ads-startup-cache.userFacingDescription: Reduce the number of old / out of date ads shown on New Tab

unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingName: Unified API for spocs and top sites - controlled rollout for release 133+
unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingDescription: We're switching to a new endpoint for the services supplying sponsored content and top sites to the new tab. This is a controlled rollout for 133 on the Release channel to that new endpoint.

long-term-holdback-2025h1-growth-desktop.userFacingDescription: Long-term holdback for 2025 H1 Growth experiments

fox-doodle-multi-action-cta-2025-rollout.userFacingDescription: Rollout: Setting Firefox as primary browser

$l10n.text: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

$l10n.text: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingName: PDF Annotations - Highlight - Treatment B Rollout
pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message in the PDF viewer that introduces the highlight toolbar button, and offers users a way to set Firefox as the default PDF handler, if it is not already.

de.screen-1-header: Hervorhebung in PDFs ist ab sofort möglich!
de.screen-2-subtitle: Sie haben jedes Mal Zugriff auf unsere Werkzeuge, wenn Sie eine PDF-Datei öffnen.
de.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Mit unserem neuen Textmarker-Werkzeug können Sie PDFs an einem Ort lesen und bearbeiten.

fr.screen-1-header: Vous pouvez désormais surligner vos PDF !
fr.screen-2-header: Faire de Firefox votre éditeur PDF par défaut ?
fr.screen-2-subtitle: Vous aurez accès à nos outils à chaque fois que vous ouvrirez un fichier PDF.
fr.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Avec notre nouvel outil de surlignage, vous pouvez consulter et modifier des fichiers PDF sans avoir besoin d’un autre logiciel.

it.screen-1-header: Ora puoi evidenziare i tuoi PDF!
it.screen-2-header: Impostare Firefox come editor predefinito per i PDF?
it.screen-2-subtitle: Avrai accesso ai nostri strumenti ogni volta che apri un PDF.
it.feature-tour-submenu-item-1: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
it.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Grazie al nuovo strumento evidenziatore puoi leggere e modificare i PDF senza bisogno di altri software.

en-CA.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-CA.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-CA.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-CA.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.

en-GB.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-GB.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-GB.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-GB.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.

en-US.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-US.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-US.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-US.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.

desktop-credit-card-autofill-global-enab.userFacingName: Desktop Credit Card Autofill Global Enablement Rollout (Release)

new-tab-layout-variant-b-and-content-car.userFacingName: New Tab Layout Variant B and Content Card UI Release Rollout - Global v2
new-tab-layout-variant-b-and-content-car.userFacingDescription: Enhance the visual design of the New Tab page

tab-groups-50-rollout-no-onboarding.userFacingDescription: Rolling out Firefox Tab Groups, a new tool for organizing tabs.

$l10n.text: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
Your bookmark will be saved just below the address bar for quick access.
You can drag and drop tabs here to keep more of your favorite sites within reach.
You can add other sites you visit more often. Simply drag and drop tabs here to keep favorite websites within reach.

recommend-bookmark-toolbar-existing-user.userFacingName: Recommend Bookmark Toolbar - Existing User Rollout
recommend-bookmark-toolbar-existing-user.userFacingDescription: Message Experiment: Recommending the bookmark toolbar

de.treatment-b-subtitle: Ziehe Tabs auf die offene Lesezeichen-Symbolleiste und lege sie ab, um deine Lieblings-Webseiten immer griffbereit zu haben.
de.treatment-c-subtitle: Wir lassen die Symbolleiste geöffnet, damit du Tabs dorthin ziehen kannst und so deine Lieblings-Webseiten immer griffbereit sind.
de.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Ein Lesezeichen wird direkt unter der Adressleiste gespeichert, damit du schnell darauf zugreifen zu kannst.
de.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: Zieh Tabs hierher und lege sie ab, um weitere deiner Lieblings-Webseiten griffbereit zu haben.
de.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: Füge andere Webseiten hinzu, die du häufiger besuchst. Ziehen Tabs hierher und lege sie ab, um deine Lieblings-Webseiten griffbereit zu haben.

fr.treatment-c-title: Ajouter ce site à la barre personnelle ?
fr.treatment-b-subtitle: Une fois ouverte, vous pouvez glisser-déposer des onglets dans la barre personnelle pour garder vos sites préférés à portée de main.
fr.treatment-c-subtitle: Nous laisserons la barre personnelle ouverte afin que vous puissiez faire glisser des onglets ici et garder vos sites préférés à portée de main.
fr.treatment-a-screen-1-title: Ajouter ce site à la barre personnelle ?
fr.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Votre marque-page sera enregistré juste en dessous de la barre d’adresse pour pouvoir y accéder rapidement.
fr.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: Vous pouvez glisser-déposer des onglets ici pour garder davantage de vos sites préférés à portée de main.
fr.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: Vous pouvez ajouter d’autres sites que vous visitez souvent. Glissez-déposez simplement des onglets ici pour garder vos sites web préférés à portée de main.

it.treatment-b-title: Mantenere aperta la barra dei segnalibri?
it.treatment-c-title: Aggiungere questo sito alla barra dei segnalibri?
it.treatment-b-subtitle: Quando è aperta, puoi trascinare le schede nella barra dei segnalibri per mantenere i tuoi siti preferiti sempre a portata di mano.
it.treatment-c-subtitle: Manterremo aperta la barra degli strumenti, così potrai trascinarvi le schede e mantenere i tuoi siti preferiti a portata di mano.
it.treatment-a-screen-1-title: Aggiungere questo sito alla barra dei segnalibri?
it.split-dismiss-button-option-1: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
it.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Il segnalibro verrà salvato appena sotto la barra degli indirizzi, così da offrirti un accesso più rapido.
it.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-title: Mantenere aperta la barra dei segnalibri?
it.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: Puoi trascinare le schede qui per tenere a portata di mano i tuoi siti preferiti.
it.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: Puoi aggiungere gli altri siti che visiti più spesso. Basta trascinare le schede qui per mantenere i tuoi siti web preferiti a portata di mano.

en-CA.treatment-c-title: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
en-CA.treatment-b-subtitle: Once open, you can drag and drop tabs onto the bookmarks toolbar to keep your favorite sites within reach.

$l10n.text: You’re signed out. Click the Account icon to sign in.
$l10n.comment: The 'account icon' is the toolbar button with a 'profile' icon of a human head/shoulders. It's for dealing with your Mozilla account. When hovering the icon, the tooltip says 'Account'

login-status-advisory-callout-rollout.userFacingDescription: Adds a tooltip notification indicating the Mozilla account login status for users who may think they are signed in, but are actually signed out.

de.login-status-advisory-title-a: Sie sind abgemeldet. Klicken Sie auf das Kontosymbol, um sich anzumelden.
de.login-status-advisory-title-b: Beginnen Sie mit der Synchronisation Ihrer Daten. Klicken Sie auf das Kontosymbol, um sich anzumelden.

fr.login-status-advisory-title-a: Votre compte est déconnecté. Cliquez sur l’icône de compte pour vous connecter.
fr.login-status-advisory-title-b: Commencez à synchroniser vos données. Cliquez sur l’icône de compte pour vous connecter.

en-CA.login-status-advisory-title-a: You’re signed out. Click the account icon to sign in.
en-CA.login-status-advisory-title-b: Start syncing your data. Click the account icon to sign in.

en-GB.login-status-advisory-title-a: You’re signed out. Click the account icon to sign in.
en-GB.login-status-advisory-title-b: Start syncing your data. Click the account icon to sign in.

en-US.login-status-advisory-title-a: You’re signed out. Click the account icon to sign in.
en-US.login-status-advisory-title-b: Start syncing your data. Click the account icon to sign in.

$l10n.text: Password saved. Let’s back it up.

account-adoption-callout-passwords-rollo.userFacingDescription: Rollout:  Account Adoption Callout for Password Users

de.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-sync-ti: Nehmen Sie Ihre gespeicherten Passwörter überall mit
de.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Passwort gespeichert. Jetzt sichern wir es.
de.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-sync-su: Erstellen Sie ein Konto, um alle Ihre verschlüsselten Passwörter mit einem anderen Gerät zu synchronisieren.
de.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Schützen Sie Ihre Passwörter, indem Sie diese verschlüsselt mit Ihren Geräten synchronisieren.

fr.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-sync-ti: Accédez partout aux mots de passe enregistrés
fr.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Mot de passe enregistré. À présent, sauvegardons-le.
fr.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-sync-su: Créez un compte pour synchroniser tous vos mots de passe chiffrés avec un autre appareil.
fr.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Protégez vos mots de passe en les chiffrant et en les synchronisant avec vos appareils.

it.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-sync-su: Crea un account per sincronizzare tutte le tue password crittate su un altro dispositivo.
it.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Proteggi le tue password sincronizzandole con i tuoi dispositivi usando la crittografia.

en-CA.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Password saved. Let’s back it up.

en-CA.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Protect your passwords by syncing them to your devices with encryption.

en-GB.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Protect your passwords by syncing them to your devices with encryption.

en-US.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Password saved. Let’s back it up.

en-US.fxa-adoption-passwords-treatment-backup-: Protect your passwords by syncing them to your devices with encryption.

desktop-release-rollout-show-relay-to-al.userFacingDescription: Firefox Relay lets you hide your real email address to keep your identity safe. This study looks at how people use Relay in the Firefox browser on their computer.
